TopReViews.Title: Not worth the money
TopReViews.Comment:
Both hotpot and bbq have nothing to called special, even with 50% discount on Wednesday night, the bill is still 1mil for 2 persons. 
Service is very very bad, we purposely called seafood combo and asked if there is meat inside? (I was fasting) they said just seafood. Brought out seafood combo with beef, lucky my friend checked. Asked the waitress to change she she wait, then ignore us. 

We finished our bbq and move to hotpot, another staff came and want to pour things on pot, I stopped her, I aske the 3rd staff to change she look at me very uncomfortable, aske me "so what do you want to eat?" I said explain the whole thing again.

Then they bring the pot away, put back a new one, I ate until saw the bottom, I saw beef blood there, they just removed the beef not changed !!!

Never come back!
